TINNY'S FASHION CAFE

About Us

briefly

Tinny's fashion is a dynamic and innovative fashion design company dedicated to bringing
contemporary style and timeless elegance to your wradrobe. our design blend modern trends with classic sophistication, ensuring each piece is unique, stylish and of the highest quality.

Read More!
What I Will Do For You

Our Services

Custom Clothing Design

we create bespoke garments tailored to individual client specifications, ensuring a perfect fit and personalized style.

Read More!

Styling and Wardrobe Consulation

we provide expert advice on personal style, helping clients curate their wardrobes, and selecting outfits for a special event.

Read More!

Technical Design and Pattern Making

we develop technical drawings, specifications and patterns for garment to ensure accurate production.

Read More!
